cast.name: 安娜·穆格拉利斯 Anna Mouglalis

introduction: REASON delivers an optimistic message of self anointment discuses superficiality as socialite and model Gemma (played by transgender supermodel Andrej Pejic) looks within and day dreams about seeing a therapist (played by Anna Mouglalis). If language is capable of creating worlds, why not dictate our own lives and come up with our own rule book? All we have to do is come up with an identity that is fulfilling and makes us happy - until a new one sounds more appealing.
